Sufferbus (1994 - 2000) is an Alternative Rock band from the Midwest. They toured the Midwest circuit extensively from 1994 to 2000 with stints on the East and West Coasts sharing the stage with the likes of: Soul Asylum, Semisonic, The Meat Puppets, Monster Magnet, Machinehead, Motorhead, etc... 

Influences: Big Star, The Beatles, The Flaming Lips, Husker Du, The Replacements

Guitar/Lead Vocals - Mitch Leggs
Bass/Vocals - Brian Harris
Drums - Ken Pingleton

Sufferbus - Sufferbus  (1997)
(Brave New Records/Diablo Musica)
